WorkItem.Description:
Hi there
 
I just downloaded the latest version and noticed that several themes still render a vertical scrollbar instead of a horizontal one if the horizontal content is too wide.
 
Steps to reproduce:
 
1: Add a longer name in code behind.
2: Start the application
3: Switch to Dave's, ShinyDarkTeal, UxMusingsBubblyBlue or several other themes
4: The control renders a vertical scrollbar at the bottom of the control (see attached screenshot)
 
Cheers,
Philipp
WorkItem.Summary: Buggy Horizontal Scrollbars in Several Themes
